ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] "Shouldn't you be playing Manasong!"
ygData.msgSnippet: Totally agree with this, and I don t think you d be totally out of line saying it. I urge any bard to find a regular party to group with (if possible). This
ygData.messageBody:
Totally agree with this, and I don't think you'd be totally out of line
saying it. I urge any bard to find a regular party to group with (if
possible). This way you develop trust, and don't have to deal with people
trying to tell you how to play a bard.

>From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
>To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] "Shouldn't you be playing Manasong!"
>Date: Tue, 20 Feb 2001 12:04:35 -0600
>
>When people do this - I say "Please don't tell me how to play my class -
>since I'm not telling you how to play yours" - of course if people try to
>imply you're not a good bard - you may even offer to leave the group so
>they
>can find a better when (which essentially you did and just avoided a
>confrontation)
